news_header: A lifeguard rescued a missing teenager lost at sea for nearly 12 hours off Hawaii, while severe weather and Hurricane Milton impacted Florida.
news_text: Noland Keaulana, a lifeguard, emotionally recounted rescuing a 17-year-old boy who had been lost at sea for almost 12 hours after receiving a text about the missing teen. Keaulana commandeered a boat and found the boy, who was later treated for exhaustion and dehydration. Meanwhile, Hurricane Milton caused severe weather in Florida, leading to widespread damage and prompting residents to prepare for the storm. The storm was monitored by astronauts and researchers, while a tornado was reported in southern Florida.
